alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 10:53PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, BULLOCH, EFFINGHAM AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 1053 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Eden, or 9 miles west of Godley Station, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...up to penny sized hail. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to plants, trees and crops is possible. Damage to windshields is unlikely. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Pooler, Pembroke, Godley Station, Lanier, Port Wentworth, Bloomingdale, Blitchton, and Marlow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bulloch; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham
